com.upc.repository

接口 BuyRelationRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<BuyRelation,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<BuyRelation,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<BuyRelation,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<BuyRelation,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface BuyRelationRepository
extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<BuyRelation,java.lang.Long>

    • 方法详细资料

      • findByUserNodeId

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:BUY_GOOD]->(m:Phone)where n.user_id = {userId} return p order by b.LastTime desc")
java.util.List<BuyRelation> findByUserNodeId(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                       int userId)

      • findByUserAndPhone

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:BUY_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and  m.good_id = {goodId} return p")
BuyRelation findByUserAndPhone(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                           int userId,
                                                                                                                                                           @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                           int goodId)

      • findByPhoneNodeId

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:BUY_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where m.good_id = {goodId} return p")
java.util.List<BuyRelation> findByPhoneNodeId(@Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                int goodId)

      • createBuyRelation

        @Query(value="MATCH (n:UserNode),(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and m.good_id = {goodId} create (n)-[b:BUY_GOOD{BuyTimes:1,LastTime:{lastTime} }]->(m)")
void createBuyRelation(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                                       int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                                                       int goodId,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="lastTime")
                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String lastTime)

      • updateInfo

        @Query(value="MATCH (n:UserNode)-[b:BUY_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and m.good_id = {goodId} set b.BuyTimes = b.BuyTimes + 1 set b.LastTime = {lastTime} ")
void updateInfo(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                                             int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                                                             int goodId,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Param(value="lastTime")
                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String lastTime)
